metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1010176 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: JerryScript commit 4e58ccf68070671e1fff5cd6673f0c1d5b80b166 is affected by: Buffer Overflow. The impact is: denial of service and possibly arbitrary code execution. The component is: function lit_char_to_utf8_bytes (jerry-core/lit/lit-char-helpers.c:377). The attack vector is: executing crafted javascript code. The fixed version is: after commit 505dace719aebb3308a3af223cfaa985159efae0.

notes.Note: sbeattie> iotjs contains an embedded code copy of jerryscript

criterions.comment: iotjs package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
